name: sour cream
description:
this cream has been produced before the cataclysm using different types of biotics.
while you're not certain how this was produced, this product was used in many different recipes to give humidity to foods, or that hint of cream some foods desperately need.
while not exactly filling on it's own, you can think of a couple of uses for it if you found some things in a grocery store...

name: dip sauce
description: this cream is a very tasty mix of sour cream with quick dip powder mix.
